rundown: 1-10 L @ Athletics Jesse Chavez: 3.0 innings, 2 earned runs, 4 hits, 2 HR, 4 strikeouts Batters: Eli White (1 hits - 4 AB, 1 HR, 1 RBI) The Braves suffered a tough loss against the Athletics, managing only one run while allowing ten. The game was marked by a lack of offensive production and struggles on the mound. Key highlights include: 1. Jesse Chavez gave up two home runs in his three innings of work, contributing to the team's struggles. 2. Eli White provided the lone bright spot for the Braves with a home run and an RBI. 3. The Braves were out-hit 10 to 6, indicating a significant gap in offensive performance.
